Kushina creates a barrier seal on the ground. If the opponent steps on the barrier seal, two frying pans appear in the sky and fall on the opponent, knocking them unconscious.

[[pl:Ashimoto Chūitsu!]]
[[pt-br:Cuidado onde Pisa!]]
